name: Super Fidget Spinner
description: Super Fidget Spinner is the reason I, NAL, shouldn't drink on a Tuesday. A desperate self-serving wake up call that I should stick to making fonts and actual games worth the time of the general public. And it is the result of a fascination with a small, inexpensive birthday present I received last week that I have since been unable to put down due to my lifelong obsession with stupid objects that don't do anything of value or productivity and are available in a range of colours, shapes, sizes and qualities. Four bearings set into a small chunk of cheap plastic and I'm dedicating time to program tributes to it. Good.
